short_description: This function generates embeddings of documents and words. It also finds similarity between the texts.
long_description: This function generates embeddings of documents and words. It also finds similarity between the texts. This helps in machine learning applications because many machine learning algorithms process real values rather than text.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the input text data from user.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input text data from user.

input_tables.name: ModelTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the vectors for all the possible tokens.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the vectors for all the possible tokens.

argument_clauses.name: IDColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the IDColumn in InputTable which contains unique values.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the IDColumn in InputTable which contains unique values.

argument_clauses.name: ModelTextColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the ModelTable column which contains the token in ModelTable.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the ModelTable column which contains the token in ModelTable.

argument_clauses.name: ModelVectorColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the ModelTable columns which contains the vectors for each token.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the ModelTable columns which contains the vectors for each token.

argument_clauses.name: PrimaryColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the PrimaryColumn which contains the text data.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the PrimaryColumn which contains the text data.

argument_clauses.name: SecondaryColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the SecondaryColumn which contains the text data applicable only if operation is token2token-similarity or Doc2Doc-similarity.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the SecondaryColumn which contains the text data applicable only if operation is token2token-similarity or Doc2Doc-similarity.

argument_clauses.name: Operation
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify which operation needs to be performmed on the data.
argument_clauses.description: Specify which operation needs to be performmed on the data.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify which columns to be accumulated from input to output.
argument_clauses.description: Specify which columns to be accumulated from input to output.

argument_clauses.name: ConvertToLowerCase
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to convert input data to lower case.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to convert input data to lower case.

argument_clauses.name: RemoveStopWords
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to remove stop words the input data.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to remove stop words the input data.

argument_clauses.name: StemTokens
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to stem tokens from the input data.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to stem tokens from the input data.
